entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimized symbol location collections #68020
    Compiler.Next
  • AnalysisMode "Recommended" is misleading #68018

Closed

  • Getting address to a managed `ref` field returns the value of the field, not the address #68000
    17.7
  • Support defining aliases for generic definition types. #68013
  • Checksum's usage of a native hash algorithm resulting in thread starvation #67995
  • Bug using auto-properties in record structs? #68017

PullRequests

Created

  • Check ILegacyGlobalOptionsWorkspaceService is null in GenerateConstructorFromMembersCodeRefactoringProvider #68024
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test scouting queue with the merge #68023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use scouting queue to unblock VS package upgrade #68022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .editorconfig only shows as dirty with changes #68021
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement support for Inline Array conversions #68019
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Remove redundant hex digit validator from lexer #68016
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Move the SyntaxTree and SemanticModel action based analyzers to respect context.FilterSpan #68014
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Refactoring: Consistently use `Keyword` helper in C# help service #68015
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Use optimized hash creation methods on .NET 5+ #67999
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Incremental Generators documentation fix #68002
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors: address duplicate interceptions feedback, handle nameof, add test coverage #67971
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Cleanup/perf in creating member maps. #67997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create file based on project path if the file path is null in LSP code action handler #68006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Convert bad expressions for error recovery #68011
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation
  • Filter out EnableNullable code actions #68005
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67994
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P3
  • Avoid reusing ref receiver temp #67955
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Use client languageId when file path is ambiguous #68010
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
